page.title: 05Population in Chilsworthy
page.content: In our area in the last few years there have been many changes.In 1963 the railway service through our survey area was withdrawn. Although road surfaces have improved, the{bus {service}has practically vanished. Many older people said that modernisation as such had only affected the area comparatively recently. There has also been a great{increase in the number of {houses}and the{influx of people moving {into the area}has meant that village life is busier than before.More houses now have garages built during the last few years to accommodate the growing number of{vehicles necessary {for transport.}The increase in population had, in some people's opinion, kept the village alive although most work outside the area.
